so_48937182: export -f try_or_wait  # export shell functions so child processes can run it

read -r result < <(
  for ((i=0; i<20; ++i)); do
    printf '%s\0' "$1"
  done | xargs -0 -n 1 -P 20 bash -c 'try_or_wait "$@"' _
)

so_41720336: while IFS='' read -r line
do
  host=$(grep report <<< "$line" |cut -f5 -d' ')
  ip=$(grep report <<< "$line" |sed 's/^.*(//;s/)$//') 
  printf "Host:$host - IP:$ip"
done < <(nmap -sP 192.168.1.1/24)
